info.title: Azure AgFoodPlatform Data Plane Service
info.description: APIs documentation for Azure AgPlatform DataPlane Service.

Bearer.description: Please provide a valid bearer token for authorized API calls. Note that you might need to clear your browser cache if you tried un-authenticated calls before.
Bearer.name: Authorization

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Catalog resources.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description:
Filters on key-value pairs within the Properties object.
eg. "{testKey} eq {testValue}".

parameters.name: minLastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description: Minimum last modified date of resource (inclusive).

parameters.name: maxLastModifiedDateTime
parameters.description: Maximum last modified date of resource (inclusive).

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive).
Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default value = 50.

parameters.name: skipToken
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

patch.description: Creates or updates a Catalog resource.

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: Catalog resource payload to create or update.

delete.description: Deletes Catalog for given Catalog id.

parameters.name: catalogId
parameters.description: Id of Catalog to be deleted.

parameters.description: Collection resource payload to create or update.

post.description: Search for Items across all parties by intersecting geometry.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default Value = 50.

post.description: Search for Items across all collections.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default Value = 50.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 1, Maximum = 100, Default value = 10.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

post.description: Searches for STAC items by collection id, bbox, intersecting geometry, start and end datetime.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Maximum number of items needed (inclusive). Minimum = 1, Maximum = 100, Default value = 10.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

Operation-Location.description: The location for monitoring the operation state.

post.description: Gets Solution get job response async.
Downloads and returns file Stream as response for the given input filePath.

ApiKeyAuthCredentials.description: Api Key Auth Credentials class for API Key based Auth.

AuthCredentials.description: AuthCredentials abstract base class for Auth Purpose.

AuthCredentialsKind.description: Enum for different types of AuthCredentials supported.

eTag.description: The ETag value to implement optimistic concurrency.

createdDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was created, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

modifiedDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was last modified, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

properties.description:
A collection of key value pairs that belongs to the resource.
Each pair must not have a key greater than 50 characters
and must not have a value greater than 150 characters.
Note: A maximum of 25 key value pairs can be provided for a resource and only string,
numeral and datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ) values are supported.

CatalogCollection.description: Schema for storing catalog and collection id.

collectionIds.description: Owner Item Ids of the resource.

Error.description: An error from the Azure AgPlatform service.

details.description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

ErrorForLocation.description: Model for error information for a failed location.

code.description: Status code returned by data provider.

retryable.description: Flag suggesting if retry attempt with same request body should be made to fetch required data.

ErrorResponse.description: An error response from the Azure AgPlatform service. See https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses for ErrorResponse reference document.

GeoJsonObject.description: GeoJSON (For more details: https://geojson.org/). Note: Coordinates are expected in [Longitude, Latitude] format.

filePath.description: ADLS path of the image file.

resolution.description: Resolution of image file in meters.

ImageFormat.description: Supported image formats for scene resource.

InnerError.description: Inner error containing list of errors.See https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#innererror--object for InnerError reference document.

code.description: Specific error code than was provided by the containing error.

data.description: Schema for records under the dataset.

Measures.description: Schema for storing measurement readings and unit.

coordinates.description:
Gets or sets Coordinates of GeoJSON Object.
It must be an array of polygons, each polygon contains list of linear rings.
For Polygons with more than one of these rings, the first MUST be the exterior ring,
and any others MUST be interior rings.

Gets or sets the coordinate of this point.
It must be an array of 2 or 3 elements for a 2D or 3D system.

Gets or sets type of the GeoJSON Object.
It must be an array of linear ring coordinate arrays.
For Polygons with more than one of these rings, the first MUST be the exterior ring,
and any others MUST be interior rings.

imageFormats.description: List of ImageFormats. Available value: TIF.

imageResolutions.description: List of ImageResolutions in meters. Available values: 10, 20, 60.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

startDateTime.description: Start datetime of the time interval in which to search for Items.

provider.description: Provider of satellite data. Available Value: SentinelHub.

endDateTime.description: End datetime of the time interval in which to search for Items.

bbox.description:
Only items that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected.
The bounding box is provided as four numbers. The coordinate reference system of the values is WGS84 longitude/latitude.

featureIds.description: Array of feature ids to return.

providerCollectionId.description: Collection of satellite data. Available Value: sentinel-2-l2a, sentinel-2-l1c.

eTag.description: The ETag value to implement optimistic concurrency.

createdDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was created, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

modifiedDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was last modified, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

properties.description:
A collection of key value pairs that belongs to the resource.
Each pair must not have a key greater than 50 characters
and must not have a value greater than 150 characters.
Note: A maximum of 25 key value pairs can be provided for a resource and only string,
numeral and datetime (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ) values are supported.

SearchFeaturesResponse.description: Paged response contains list of items and next property to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description:
URL to do the POST request with same filters,
to get next set of items.

StacItem.description:
Schema of STAC Item.
Refer for spec: https://github.com/radiantearth/stac-spec/blob/v1.0.0-beta.2/item-spec/item-spec.md#item-fields.

stacVersion.description: The STAC version the Stac Item implements.

stacExtensions.description: A list of extensions the Stac Item implements.

id.description: Provider identifier. Globally unique ID by Data provider.

type.description: Type of the GeoJSON Object. It's value is always Feature.

geometry.description:
Defines the full footprint of the asset represented by this item.
Its a GeoJSON geometry.

properties.description: A dictionary of additional metadata for the item.

links.description: List of link objects to resources and related URLs.

assets.description: Dictionary of asset objects, each with a unique key.

providerCollectionId.description: The id of the STAC Collection this Stac Item references.

rel.description: The relation type of the link.

type.description: The type of the link. Optional.

title.description: The title of the link. Optional.

additionalAttributes.description: A collection of key value pairs that belongs to the resource. Each pair must not have a key greater than 50 characters and must not have a value greater than 250 characters. Note: A maximum of 100 key value pairs can be provided for a resource and only string and numeral values are supported.

dayOrNight.description: This data field indicates whether it is daytime or nighttime based on the Local Apparent Time of the location.

iconCode.description: This number is the key to the weather icon lookup. The data field shows the icon number that is matched to represent the observed weather conditions.

iconCodeExtend.description: Code representing full set sensible weather.

hasPrecipitation.description: Indicates whether there is precipitation or not.

uvDescription.description: The UV Index Description which complements the UV Index value by providing an associated level of risk of skin damage due to exposure (-2 = Not Available, -1 = No Report, 0 to 2 = Low, 3 to 5 = Moderate, 6 to 7 = High, 8 to 10 = Very High, 11 to 16 = Extreme).

validTimeLocal.description: Time forecast is valid in local apparent time.

validTime.description: Time forecast is valid in Utc format.

wxPhraseLong.description: Hourly sensible weather phrase containing longer description.

wxPhraseShort.description: Hourly sensible weather phrase containing short description.

WeatherDataErrors.description: Model for errors encountered for all failed locations.

locations.description: List of errors encountered for all failed locations.

value.description: Location Value eg. "10,-25" for LocationType Type "LatLong".

requestCompletionTime.description: Request Completion Time in Utc of the location.

lastRefreshedDateTime.description: Date-time when resource was last requested, sample format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

providerApiName.description: Provider's api name to which request is to be made.

language.description: Language (IETF BCP 47 language tag) in which search results should be returned by the data provider. Examples: 'en-US', 'es', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR'.

units.description: Units for which request to data provider is to be sent. Supported values are 'e' for English units, 'm' for Metric units, 'h' for Hybrid units (UK) and 's' for Metric SI units.

locations.description: List of locations for which weather data need to be fetched from the provider.

providerApiName.description: Provider's api name to which request is to be made.

language.description: Language (IETF BCP 47 language tag) in which search results should be returned by the data provider. Examples: 'en-US', 'es', 'es-MX', 'fr-FR'.

units.description: Units for which request to data provider is to be sent. Supported values are 'e' for English units, 'm' for Metric units, 'h' for Hybrid units (UK) and 's' for Metric SI units.

WeatherResponse.description: Schema of Weather Data Provider Response.

status.description: Indicates a Succeeded, Failed, or PartiallySucceeded response.

locations.description: List of weather data for all the weather locations.
